info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:03PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MONROE... SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Barnesville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, St. Clairsville, Bellaire, Woodsfield, Shadyside, McMechen, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Bridgeport, Benwood, Brookside, Beallsville, Neffs, Jerusalem, Wilson, Somerton, Alledonia, Woodlands, Glendale, and Grand Vue Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 217 and 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
